p: Overview of the speed distribution of anterograde and retrograde shows that the forward velocity is widely distributed between 0 and 1.5 μm/s, while the reverse velocity tends to the normal distribution curve ( Figures 5D,E). Subsequently, the distribution of virus particles’ state in the axon shows that the viral particles mainly conduct retrograde transport at 0.5–2 hpi and mainly conduct anterograde transport at about eight hpi ( Figure 5F). Those results indicate that rPRV SC-UL36-EGFP was suitable for tracing PRV behavior between cell body and axon in the neuron.
